price: Kandi nta kindi naremeye amajini n’abantu bitari ukugira ngo bangaragire.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
